publicwhip.spmotion: *S1M-2927 Patricia Ferguson on behalf of the Parliamentary Bureau: Approval of SSIs—That the Parliament agrees that the following instruments be approved— the Pig Industry Restructuring (Capital Grant) (Scotland) Scheme 2002 (SSI 2002/43); and the draft Public Finance and Accountability (Scotland) Act 2000 (Consequential Modifications) Order 2002. Supported by: Euan Robson*
